title: AI Artist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night. They will be converted to an AI generated role, generated from the GIM Cohere AI with their role as a template.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role cannot roll if Rasen is playing or otherwise unable to operate the GIM Cohere AI.
- You may choose to appear as a Town Investigative role of your choice to all investigative effects because AI art is definitely real art haha.
- You cannot be roleblocked by Town roles and your abilities cannot be copied or replicated because you are so hardworking and creative haha.
- Boobs
